<Auto Event: 9>I shall defend the temple with all my might!

<Auto Event: 9>Alas, mine other shard- of immolation-

<Show Switch: 24>Ask about the mysterious Falcon in the forest.
<Auto Event: 9>You know about Felix?!\. I dare say I am

a forest critter. Go alone and quietly if you
have any desire to earn his attention.
<Hide Switch: 64>What can you tell me about the Door Arcane?
<Auto Event: 9>It is from the Door Arcane that any magic
found its way to our world, including the
Shards kept in my Order. A nameless place
Would anyone or anything from beyond it
potentially help us in our current plight?
<Auto Player>I am charged with the safe-keeping of our temple
and its villagers. Yet, from what I know of
our assailants, our chances aren't good. If
aid may be found, I seek it.
<Auto Event: 9>I see, Captain. The Door Arcane is not to be
trifled with. It is the only among the three
which does not require Rangala's blessing\..\..\..
BUT I shall not grant it lightly.
<Auto Event: 9>I require time to consider this request. If
other aid does not present itself, I may
present you with its test. Return no sooner
than 15 minutes from now. I shall ponder.
<Auto Event: 9>I have decided to administer to you the Door's
Challenge. It will test your intellect.
<Auto Event: 9>Handed down from father to son,
<Auto Event: 9>A shrewd one you are, Captain. Against my

<Auto Event: 9>That is not correct. I am sorry, Captain.
